branchCategory.name: ISE30A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, IP40
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE30A is a digital pressure sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ISE30A legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ISE20A.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE30A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, IP40
